string.text: A PDA belonging to a stalker nicknamed "Coward" or "Craven".
A PDA belonging to a stalker nicknamed "Bonehead".
A PDA belonging to a stalker nicknamed "Experienced" or "Seasoned".
Fyodor's flash drive. The information is encoded.
A package with items for Maximilian.

Fyodor's PDA. 
Last entry: 
Turbid, that bitch, now won't leave me alone. The deal, of course, is profitable, but... Witnesses do not live long. If I die, then this record will clarify the situation: 
Turbid robs stalkers near the first bridge that's close to his base, when they're returning from the center of the valley with meaty artifacts. I accidentally found out about it, but did not tell anyone. I decided to rely on blackmailing like the worst rat. Turbid gave me a small amount of the loot. And the flash drive with info I left for Vasya "Mail". In the event of my death he has to decode it and give it to Maximilian. That's how it all happened.
Key to the prison cell in the mercenaries' base.
A microchip for the spatial anomalies scanner.
The scanner is configured to detect spatial anomalies.
A scanner configured to detect spatial anomalies.
Maximilian's personal box. Closed by key.
Semen Cowboy personal box. Closed by key.
Key from Semen Cowboy personal box.
Key from Ilya Barbaros personal box.
Documentation for setting up the spatial anomaly scanner.

One of the notes: \nWe figured out a nice scheme. Me and my bro wormed in along the stalkers and let around a rumour that a creature has appeared in the abandoned camp. And then we lead numbskulls there to hunt for money, one by one. We take the loot and toss the corpses in the nearby caves...
Found on the corpse of someone called Vadik.
Found on the corpse of someone called Romka.
Flash drive with various anomaly field measurements.
Box with goods for a merchant.

Last Entry: \nDamn it! Looks like I'm going to croak here. Mutants chased me into this fucking cave. Even ran into an anomaly... Like a tourist, I think. \nAnd then there's another thing. If you're reading this entry, it means that I'm not alive anymore. Be a good man and bring this PDA to the trader at Maximilian's base. There's information for him. And there's a reward for you (один хрен, не пропадать же добру) - I put all my loot at a tree near these fucking caves... Ha, someone is going to be lucky...
Home-made explosive. Several gunpowder charges connected by wires to an electronic detonator.

I was closer to the center... Artifacts there - not enough to swear by... Didn't go any further. \nDamn, Valery Palich will be mad as shit when he'll find out that I stole his gun. But what's left to do? Beasts attacked, I barely ran away. Later I'll go and take it away.

Entry: 
 I finally found the stalker about whom professor Ozersky talked about. Or, well, what was left of a stalker. I copied the data from his PDA. I'll have to remember to give it to the professor. 
 
Last entry: 
 Damn, what kind of a hell have brought myself in to? Then there's this anomaly - a goddamn choice. I approach the teleport and it just appears in another place. It gives such an impression that this crap sees through my eyes. Wish it closed its eyes. That bitch is playing cat and mouse with me... Zombies keep coming and there are no medkits left... Looks like this is the end.
Last Entry:\n For those who can not find me and take the key from the box. \n I went to the south ... Look for me there ...
Documentation for setting up the spatial anomaly scanner.
